    • Method Detail

      • generateNeededTilePositions

        public java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> generateNeededTilePositions(bwapi.UnitType unitType,
                                                                         bwapi.TilePosition targetTilePosition)
        Function for finding all required TilePositions of a building plus a additional row at the bottom, if the building can train Units.
        Parameters:
        unitType - the UnitType whose TilePositions are going to be calculated.
        targetTilePosition - the TilePosition the Unit is going to be constructed / targeted at.
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing all TilePositions that the constructed Unit would have if it was constructed at the targetTilePosition.

      • generateBuildLocation

        public bwapi.TilePosition generateBuildLocation(bwapi.UnitType building,
                                                bwapi.TilePosition targetTilePosition,
                                                ConstructionWorker worker)
        Function for finding a suitable building location around a given TilePosition.
        Parameters:
        building - the UnitType of the building that is going to be built.
        targetTilePosition - the TilePosition the new TilePosition is going to be calculated around.
        worker - the ConstructionWorker that is going to be constructing the building.
        Returns:
        a TilePosition at which the given building can be constructed or null, if none is found.

      • findCenterBuildLocation

        private bwapi.TilePosition findCenterBuildLocation()
        Function for finding a suitable building location for a center Unit.
        Returns:
        a TilePosition at which a new center building can be constructed.

      • isBaseLocationFree

        private boolean isBaseLocationFree(bwta.BaseLocation baselocation)
        Function for testing if a base location is already occupied or if it is free. It does this by scanning a radius around the provided BaseLocation and checking if a Unit is on the checked TilePosition.
        Parameters:
        baselocation - the BaseLocation that is going to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if no Units are found at the provided BaseLocation or false if one is found.

      • extractClosestEnemyBuilding

        private EnemyUnit extractClosestEnemyBuilding(bwapi.TilePosition playerStartLocation)
        Function for extracting the closest EnemyUnit (Building) from the currently known ones.
        Parameters:
        playerStartLocation - the TilePosition the Player started at.
        Returns:
        the closest enemy building to the Player's starting location.

      • sortFreeBaseLocations

        private void sortFreeBaseLocations(java.util.List<bwta.BaseLocation> baseLocations,
                                   bwapi.TilePosition playerStartLocation,
                                   EnemyUnit closestEnemyBuilding)
        Function for sorting the provided BaseLocations based on their distance towards the closest enemy buildings known. The first element in the resulting List is the one with the greatest distance towards this EnemyUnit. The closest enemy building can be null and is then not considered in the sorting of the List. In this case only the distance to the Player's starting location matters.
        Parameters:
        freeBaseLocations - the List of free BaseLocations that is going to be sorted.
        playerStartLocation - the Player's starting location which is necessary for sorting the List of free BaseLocations.
        closestEnemyBuilding - the closest enemy building. Can be null and is then not considered in the sorting of the List.

      • findRefineryBuildLocation

        private bwapi.TilePosition findRefineryBuildLocation()
        Function for finding a suitable building location around a given TilePosition with a max range for a refinery. This needs to be a special function since these buildings are constructed on top of a vaspene geyser, which has to be checked individually.
        Returns:
        a TilePosition at which the given building can be constructed or null, if none is found.

      • extractGeyserNearExistingCenter

        private bwapi.Unit extractGeyserNearExistingCenter(java.util.HashSet<bwapi.Unit> freeGeysers)
        Function for extracting a geyser from the provided HashSet of free geysers that is near an already existing center building. This should be the preferred check for suitable building locations since constructing a refinery by itself is counter productive.
        Parameters:
        freeGeysers - the HashSet of geysers without any refinery on them.
        Returns:
        a geyser of the provided HashSet near an already existing center Unit that has not yet been improved.

      • extractGeyserNearNextCenterLocation

        private bwapi.Unit extractGeyserNearNextCenterLocation(java.util.HashSet<bwapi.Unit> freeGeysers)
        Function for extracting a geyser from the provided HashSet of free geysers that is near the next generated center build location.
        Parameters:
        freeGeysers - the HashSet of geysers without any refinery on them.
        Returns:
        a geyser of the provided HashSet that is the closest one to the next generated center build location.

      • extractFreeGeysers

        private java.util.HashSet<bwapi.Unit> extractFreeGeysers()
        Function for extracting all geysers on the map without any refinery on them.
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing all geysers on the map without a refinery of the Bot's Race on them.

      • forceFindStandardBuildLocation

        private bwapi.TilePosition forceFindStandardBuildLocation(bwapi.UnitType building,
                                                          bwapi.TilePosition targetTilePosition,
                                                          int maxIterations,
                                                          ConstructionWorker worker)
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Function for initializing a force search for a possible construction spot. This function performs a flood-fill for TilePostions until either a spot is found or a threshold is reached.
        Parameters:
        building - the UnitType of the building that is going to be built.
        targetTilePosition - the TilePosition the new TilePosition is going to be calculated around.
        maxIterations - the max number of iterations until the search is stopped.
        worker - the ConstructionWorker that is going to be constructing the building.
        Returns:
        a TilePosition at which the given building can be constructed or null, if none is found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an Exception is thrown when the maximum number of iterations is reached.

      • extractRegionTilePositions

        private java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> extractRegionTilePositions(bwta.Region region)
        Function for retrieving the TilePositions inside a specific Region.
        Parameters:
        region - the Region instance whose TilePositions are going to be returned.
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing all TilePositions belonging to the provided Region.

      • extractUncontendedRegionTilePositions

        private java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> extractUncontendedRegionTilePositions(bwta.Region region)
        Function for retrieving the uncontended TilePositions inside a specific Region.
        Parameters:
        region - the Region instance whose uncontended TilePositions are going to be returned.
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing all uncontended TilePositions belonging to the provided Region.

      • addUncheckedRegions

        private void addUncheckedRegions(bwta.Region currentRegion,
                                 java.util.HashSet<bwta.Region> alreadyCheckedRegions,
                                 java.util.Queue<bwta.Region> regionsToCheck)
        Function for adding all immediately accessible Regions from the provided one that are not already checked (= Inside the provided HashSet) to the given Queue of Regions to check.
        Parameters:
        currentRegion - the Region whose neighbour-Regions are going to be added towards the Queue.
        alreadyCheckedRegions - the Regions that are going to be ignored.
        regionsToCheck - the Queue which the neighbour Regions are going to be added to.

      • getClosestTilePosition

        private bwapi.TilePosition getClosestTilePosition(bwapi.Position target,
                                                  java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> tilePositions)
        Function for extracting the closest TilePosition to a given Position from a HashSet of TilePosition instances.
        Parameters:
        target - the target Position instance to which the distance will be calculated.
        tilePositions - the HashSet of TilePositions which the function will iterate over.
        Returns:
        either the closest TilePosition from the provided HashSet of TilePositions to the given Position or null if the HashSet is empty.

      • generatePossibleAdjacentTilePositions

        private java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> generatePossibleAdjacentTilePositions(bwapi.TilePosition tilePosition,
                                                                                    java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> regionTilePositions,
                                                                                    java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> checkedTilePositions)
        Function for generating the TilePositions that are the direct neighbours of a provided TilePosition instance. This includes the TilePositions matching the following orientations:
        • Top-Left
        • Top
        • Top-Right
        • Left
        • Right
        • Bottom-Left
        • Bottom
        • Bottom-Right
        The function then checks if the generated TilePositions are inside the provided HashSet of possible Region TilePositions and not inside the checked one! Only TilePositions matching both criteria are being returned in the resulting HashSet.
        Parameters:
        tilePosition - the TilePosition whose neighbours are being generated.
        regionTilePositions - a HashSet containing all possible TilePositions that can be returned.
        checkedTilePositions - a HashSet containing all TilePositions that must not be returned.
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing the neighbour TilePositions from the provided TilePosition instance matching the criteria mentioned above.

      • isInRegionAndUnchecked

        private boolean isInRegionAndUnchecked(bwapi.TilePosition tilePosition,
                                       java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> regionTilePositions,
                                       java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> checkedTilePositions)
        Function for checking if a TilePosition instance is inside the HashSet of Region TilePositions and not inside the ones marking the already checked ones.
        Parameters:
        tilePosition - the TilePosition instance that is going to be checked.
        regionTilePositions - the HashSet of Region TilePositions.
        checkedTilePositions - the HashSet of TilePositions that are forbidden / already marked.
        Returns:
        true if the Region TilePosition HashSet contains the provided TilePosition while the checked TilePosition HashSet does not.

      • isTilePositionValidConstructionSpot

        private boolean isTilePositionValidConstructionSpot(bwapi.UnitType building,
                                                    bwapi.TilePosition possibleTilePosition,
                                                    java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> currentRegionTilePositions,
                                                    java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> currentRegionUncontendedTilePositions)
        Function for checking if a provided TilePosition can be used as a construction spot. This takes the dimensions of the building and the possible + uncontended TilePositions of the Region into account.
        Parameters:
        building - the type of building that is going to be constructed.
        possibleTilePosition - the TilePosition that is being tested as a possible construction spot.
        currentRegionTilePositions - the possible TilePositions of the Region.
        currentRegionUncontendedTilePositions - the free TilePositions of the Region.
        Returns:
        true if the building can be constructed on the provided TilePosition, false if not.
